forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with sunny and windy conditions during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Showers early then clearing with bright sunshine by the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low around 5C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
